page.title: 13Our School (continued)
page.content: Cooking:Some children go cooking.Some mummies come to help with the cooking.We cook lots of things.We make very nice things to eat.We make cheese straws,chocolate cookies,jam tarts,fairy cakes. Library:We have lots of books in the library.The library van changes some books.We change the books twice a year.there was an A Team book.We can have a book one time each week. The Maypole:the maypole comes out at summer.We go all around the maypole.It is fun going around the maypole.You can make a Spider's Web with it too.The maypole goes round and round and it has white and blue and red,green,yellow, orange too and there is a pole in the middle.
